external_games.name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Wilderness Cosmetics Pack

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Wilderness Cosmetics Pack
summary: Dear Anglers, thank you for your continued support. It’s invaluable to us. As a token of appreciation, we hope you'll enjoy this free pack containing a complete outfit, three car liveries, and three boat liveries. Thanks again, we couldn’t do this without you!
